answer: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
details: Words of Jack Sparrow in the first movie of the saga.

challenge.prompt: What movie is this quote taken from?
challenge.text: Me? I'm dishonest, and a dishonest man you can always trust to be dishonest. Honestly. It's the honest ones you want to watch out for, because you can never predict when they're going to do something incredibly... stupid.
